channel.title: Define love
channel.description: I'm curious to see how people define love, it is a very commonly used word but it seems to have a very abstract meaning. Also, what makes love so special? When I say define love I mean love towards another human being. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Love If your not too sure on what love is s'post to be.

item.title: Define love
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:34, topic:464087”]WE DECIDE WHAT LOVE IS!

Because of that love could be anything we choose it to be. We decided it to be strong attraction to another being.[/quote]
So it’s based off of someone’s point of view?

Read full topic

item.title: Define love
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:32, topic:464087”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=567889.msg4124942#msg4124942 date=1350257933]

You cannot prove love…

well uh, you can, because you can observe the physical chemical changes that occur in the brain when someone experiences the feeling of ‘love’

That could be nothing more then attraction.
Not such thing as love.

because people in love are always 100% attracted to each other

also found in this thread: people in love absolutely can not hate each other

People say they’re in love but don’t actually mean it. I could say I loved someone but I wouldn’t mean it, you cannot prove Love.

When two people love one and other you don’t need to prove it, you just feel it. If you need proof for love then you don’t love someone.
[/quote]
Then how can you considerate it love? If we don’t know exactly what love is how can we assume it’s love? Maybe it’s just attraction?[/quote]

You wouldn’t know unless you’ve been in love. It’s indescribable; that doesn’t mean it isn’t real.

Read full topic

item.title: Define love
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’ve tried doing this several times, it just seems impossible to me. As a singer/songwriter my songs come from the heart and I’ve written a few aimed towards my girlfriend. There was a particular verse where it took me around 3 weeks to write just because I had to describe my feelings and I couldn’t say anymore than love. It’s the most powerful feeling in the world in my opinion, it changes a person completely.

Read full topic

item.title: Define love
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

@RandQm that wouldn’t make sense.

1x hate - 1x hate = nothing
(1x hate + 1x love) - 1x hate = 1x love
